paragraph.heading: 2Compiling
paragraph.paragraph:
To compile the example:
Start Visual Studio .NET
Choose Open Project from the File menu.
Navigate to <Eiffel_ENViSioN!_installation_path>\compiler\examples\(.net version)\winforms\tree_view\ and select tree_view_ctl.eifp
Clicking open loads the selected project
Launch EiffelStudio.
Select Use existing Ace (control file) and click OK
Browse to $ISE_EIFFEL\examples\dotnet\winforms\control_reference\tree_view_ctl\
Choose the Ace file for the version of the .net framework you are running
Choose the directory where the project will be compiled, by default the same directory containing the Ace file.
Click OK.
paragraph.heading: 2Running
paragraph.paragraph: After launching the application, you will see a window displayed with a similar appearance to the one above. On the left of the form you have the TREE_VIEW control, and on the right you have some controls to configure the TREE_VIEW.
paragraph.heading: 2Under the Hood
paragraph.paragraph: The application shows how to use a TREE_VIEW and what are all its different configurations.
